alert.note: Alert for Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:11PM AKST until January 30 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills to 55 below occuring. Snow, and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Visibility one half mile or less in blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Brooks Range near Passes. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
